title: Need to know what typeface this is, please
content:
I'm trying to find out what typeface this is. If anyone knows I would appreciate the info. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bluejeans.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150113181628/http:/typophile.com/files/bluejeans.jpg) | 9.42 KB |
author: desktop

comments.content: Looks like a knockoff of sign-painting alphabets popular during the first two decades of the Twentieth Century…
